tool_description: Get the updated and hyper-accurate weather/aqi information of any city.
name: The Weather API
title: The Weather API

api_list.name: weather report
api_list.description: Gives weather report of a particular city.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-weather-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/weather/mumbai"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-weather-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://the-weather-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/weather/{cityname}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-weather-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

test_endpoint.message: You are not subscribed to this API.
